articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Trump's post-attack talk doesn't change terror response
articles.description: Donald Trump just changed the way Presidents talk about terror attacks.

articles.author: Nicole Chavez, Holly Yan, Eric Levenson and Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: New York attack suspect should get death penalty, Trump says
articles.description: The suspect in New York's deadliest terror attack since 9/11 has been charged with federal terrorism offenses in Tuesday's attack  that left eight people dead, authorities said.

articles.title: Trump: US justice system is a laughingstock - CNN Video
articles.description: President Trump called for "quick" and "strong" justice for terror suspects in the wake of the deadly New York City truck attack, adding that the way the US punishes terrorists is "a laughingstock." CNN's Jim Acosta reports.

articles.author: Nicole Chavez, CNN
articles.title: New York terror suspect planned more carnage, document shows
articles.description: The man accused of driving a truck down a crowded bike path in New York  showed no remorse about the attack and wanted to display  the ISIS flag in his hospital room, a criminal complaint alleges.

articles.author: James Masters, CNN
articles.title: 5 Argentines on high school reunion trip among dead in New York attack
articles.description: Five friends from Argentina celebrating the 30th anniversary of their high school graduation were among the eight people killed in Tuesday's terror attack in New York.

articles.author: Holly Yan and James Griffiths, CNN
articles.title: Who is New York terror suspect Sayfullo Saipov?
articles.description: Sayfullo Habibullaevic Saipov bounced across the United States and eventually settled down in New Jersey with his wife and three children, officials said.

articles.author: Emanuella Grinberg, CNN
articles.title: 7 new details from the New York truck attack investigation
articles.description: A criminal complaint filed Wednesday lays out evidence collected so far in support of federal terrorism charges against Sayfullo Saipov.

articles.author: Juana Summers, CNN
articles.title: Michelle Obama to young people: Never tweet (sort of)
articles.description: Ten months removed from the White House, former first lady Michelle Obama took a subtle swipe at her old home's current occupant without even using his name. She didn't need to.

articles.author: Barbara Starr, Jamie Crawford and Brad Lendon, CNN
articles.title: Navy: 2 deadly collisions were 'avoidable'
articles.description: In both collisions, the US Navy found numerous failures by the crews and commanders of the ships.

articles.author: Jeff Zeleny and Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Russia probe raises the stakes on Trump's Asia trip
articles.description: President Donald Trump spent hours isolated in the third-floor residence of the White House for two straight mornings this week, agonizing over developments in the Russia investigation, as aides scrambled to reschedule some briefings to prepare him for the most complicated foreign trip of his presidency.

articles.author: BBC News

articles.description: Unlike past attacks on US soil, President Trump was quick to assign blame after New York incident.
